articles.content: With absolutely no warning, My Chemical Romance released their first new song in eight years last night (May 12) ahead of their global reunion tour. Clocking in at six minutes and touching on stadium… [+2323 chars]

articles.title: True blue: can James Cameron’s Avatar 2 silence the naysayers? - The Guardian
